name: 2D Shooter (vincentmlapenna)
description:
This is my 2D Shooter Project. 

Proposed Modifications:

1) Creating a complete, interesting, comprehensive, and coherent level. 

2) Adding multiple levels and tying them in to create logical progression throughout the game. 

3) Modifying the out-of-game menus in some significant and meaningful way. 

Credits:

Created by Vinnie LaPenna
